title: Weird Tales v11n04 [1928-04] (-ifc, ibc) (sas)
description: Note: The inside front cover and inside back cover are missing from the scan of this issue. CONTENTS: Weird Tales [v11 #4, April 1928] (25¢, 144pp+, pulp, cover by C. C.
